languages.text: "Когда этот бардак закончится, мы устроим свадьбу на Даргонусе. Великолепную, достойную нас".
"When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."
languages.original_text: "Когда этот бардак закончится, мы устроим свадьбу на Даргонусе. Великолепную, достойную нас".

traits.locale_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."
"When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."
"When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."
"When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

languages.text: “等这一切结束之后，咱们就去达戈努斯举行婚礼吧，举行一场属于你我二人的盛大婚礼。”
languages.original_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

traits.locale_text: “等这一切结束之后，咱们就去达戈努斯举行婚礼吧，举行一场属于你我二人的盛大婚礼。”

languages.text: 「この騒動が終わったら、ダルゴナスで式を挙げよう。私達のふさわしい、立派なものを」
languages.original_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

traits.locale_text: 「この騒動が終わったら、ダルゴナスで式を挙げよう。私達のふさわしい、立派なものを」

languages.text: «Cuando todo este lío termine, celebraremos nuestra boda en Dargonus. Será una ocasión magnífica, digna de l{mf|o|a}s dos».
languages.original_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando todo este lío termine, celebraremos nuestra boda en Dargonus. Será una ocasión magnífica, digna de l{mf|o|a}s dos».

languages.text: « Quand nous en aurons terminé avec toute cette histoire, nous nous marierons sur Dargonus. Ce serait un événement grandiose, digne de nous deux. »
languages.original_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

traits.locale_text: « Quand nous en aurons terminé avec toute cette histoire, nous nous marierons sur Dargonus. Ce serait un événement grandiose, digne de nous deux. »

languages.text: "Wenn das hier alles vorbei ist, werden wir Hochzeit auf Dargonus feiern. Ein herrliches Ereignis, das unser würdig ist."
languages.original_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn das hier alles vorbei ist, werden wir Hochzeit auf Dargonus feiern. Ein herrliches Ereignis, das unser würdig ist."

languages.text: "Bu karmaşa sona erdikten sonra Dargonus'ta evlenelim. Bize layık, gösterişli bir düğün yapalım."
languages.original_text: "When this mess is over, we shall have a wedding on Dargonus. A magnificent occasion worthy of us."

traits.locale_text: "Bu karmaşa sona erdikten sonra Dargonus'ta evlenelim. Bize layık, gösterişli bir şey olsun."
